As everyone was dealing with the efforts of caring for the family and
welcoming them into the fold LORD ELDER came into the room a slight
frown on his face.

"How is your new family doing?" ELDER said, temporarily hiding his
sense of foreboding that he felt.

In a way ELDER felt as if he were talking to a newcomer even though it
was TUCSON and TALON, but they had both undergone so many changes, and
now the family. He couldn't help feeling that there was something
wrong. His conversations with LEGACY had only filled him with more
reservations.

 "Are you comfortable here?" He said. "Anything you need?"

(TAG)

- Preston


On 7/13/12, Sandra Panico <magicquartz@...> wrote:
> Straightshot takes a seat next to the babies and stays put, looking to Talon
> with a gentile smile.
>
> " I've been wanting ta do this for a while.  They're so cute, that I can't
> resist the urge to pick them up and cuddle them.   But I know their rest is
> very important.  And so is their feeding. "
>
